Google Code Project Hosting - A replacement for Sourceforge?

12 Aug 2006

engtech Â» Google Code Project Hosting - A replacement for Sourceforge?: "There is a new entry into the open source software code repository space: Google Code - Project Hosting. This will hopefully be a long awaited kick in the pants for Sourceforge.net which hosts many, many projects but it can be difficult to find the cream of the crop, compare similar solutions and weed dead projects from the results."
